Package com.linecorp.armeria.server.auth

Class HttpAuthServiceBuilder

java.lang.Object
com.linecorp.armeria.server.auth.AuthServiceBuilder
com.linecorp.armeria.server.auth.HttpAuthServiceBuilder
@Deprecated
public final class HttpAuthServiceBuilder
extends AuthServiceBuilder
Deprecated.
Use AuthService.builder().
Builds a new AuthService.

    • onSuccess

      public HttpAuthServiceBuilder onSuccess​(AuthSuccessHandler<HttpRequest,​HttpResponse> successHandler)
      Deprecated.
      Description copied from class: AuthServiceBuilder
      Sets the AuthSuccessHandler which handles successfully authorized requests. By default, the request will be delegated to the next HttpService.
      Overrides:
      onSuccess in class AuthServiceBuilder

    • onFailure

      public HttpAuthServiceBuilder onFailure​(AuthFailureHandler<HttpRequest,​HttpResponse> failureHandler)
      Deprecated.
      Description copied from class: AuthServiceBuilder
      Sets the AuthFailureHandler which handles the requests with failed authorization. By default, an exception thrown during authorization is logged at WARN level (if any) and a 401 Unauthorized response will be sent.
      Overrides:
      onFailure in class AuthServiceBuilder
